description:
Located in Yorkville, Illinois, the law office of Majer, Sheen & Piereth, P.C., offers a full range of quality, effective legal services in a variety of practice areas to help you with all of the important and pressing legal issues affecting your life and livelihood, your freedom, your family, and your future. With an additional office in Sycamore, they have become one of Northern Illinois' premier legal practices for those with legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Criminal defense
  • Personal injury
  • Family law and divorce
  • Child support and custody

The law firm's three founding partners, attorneys Jason Majer, Scott W. Sheen and Kristopher Piereth, possess more than 60 years of combined legal experience, and they have successfully handled over 1,500 trials, resulting in more than $10 million in damages awarded. During this same time, they have also helped secure numerous dismissals, acquittals and reductions of charges for the accused along with assisting and guiding many more through highly contentious divorce proceedings.

Recognized for their success, the firm's attorneys have also earned top rankings from several national peer review sources, including the National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 Attorneys. In addition, they have received "Superb" client ratings on Avvo along with the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Criminal Law Attorneys.

To begin the process of retaining the best possible legal counsel for your matter, you can contact Majer, Sheen & Piereth, P.C., by phone or through their law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation. They promise to always aggressively pursue the most favorable outcome on your behalf to increase your chances of success.
